# ODEinherit

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Measuring regulatory network inheritance in dividing yeast cells using ordinary differential equations.


## Installation

You can install the development version of ODEinherit from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("WenbinWu2001/ODEinherit")
```
